sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Maneuver) Once per round, before the character makes a ranged attack, he may perform a True Aim maneuver. By performing this maneuver, the character gains all the benefits for aiming and also upgrades his attack roll once per rank of True Aim.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>True Aim</name> <number>TAL0001234</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 13:16:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4a58d06a2fbf1490e0f497eef699b661</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 13:16:52</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
